rules_text: [i]Divine Virtue[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast a nonland card from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: [i]“The Experiment we are about to perform will put great power into the hands of the Kappa of the mountain and the Humans of the village! Watch and be amazed, and worship us!”[/i]
